quote: No empire lasts forever, no dynasty continues unbroken. Some day, you and I will be mere legends. All that matters is whether we did what we could with the life that was given to us.
quote_letters: NO EMPIRE LASTS FOREVER NO DYNASTY CONTINUES UNBROKEN SOME DAY YOU AND I WILL BE MERE LEGENDS ALL THAT MATTERS IS WHETHER WE DID WHAT WE COULD WITH THE LIFE THAT WAS GIVEN TO US
